ComicInfo.Title: Order from Chaos, Part 3
ComicInfo.Summary:
Michelangelo is warmly welcomed when he visits the Mutanimals. But the hospitality may be cut short when he discovers what Hob’s new plan is…
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ Reg | Regular Cover | Michael Dialynas | 1 | RI | 1:10 Retailer Incentive Cover | Atilio Rojo | 2 | Sub | Subscription Cover | Kevin Eastman (a) & Ronda Pattison (c) | 3 |
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-04-21 00:21:19. [CVDB508912]
ComicInfo.Writer: Kevin Eastman, Bobby Curnow, Tom Waltz
ComicInfo.CoverArtist: Atilio Rojo, Kevin Eastman, Michael Dialynas, Ronda Pattison
ComicInfo.Characters: April O'Neil, Casey Jones, Darius Dun, Elizabeth O'Neil, Herman the Hermit Crab, Hun, Jammer, Kara Lewis, Lindsey Baker, Michelangelo, Mondo Gecko, Mutagen Man, Old Hob, Pete, Raphael, Ray Fillet, Sally Pride , Shredder, Slash
ComicInfo.Teams: Mutanimals, New York Police Department, Street Phantoms
ComicInfo.Locations: New York City, New York State
